title: RITO LOOK IN PLZ
body:
few days a go i brought something by mistake, so i want to ask if i can get another refund chance??????????
CAN I PLZ???????

replies.body:
Hey there,

Have you used all your [refund tokens](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751864-Content-Refund-FAQ#h2q1)?

If so then you are not entitled to any more refunds and Riot will not refund content for any reason.
